data.text:
The mythology says that Hercules rested here after separating the continents of Europe and Africa. Do you know what place it is? Find it out in this #VoloteaTravelBlog: https://t.co/uUz7P976qs
@ana_hmac  📸 https://t.co/I1XT2Mgofs
Più voliamo, più vogliamo conoscere. Ecco perché abbiamo aperto una nuova rotta: Genova - Creta (Herakleio). Festeggialo con noi adesso e prenota subito i tuoi voli da € 9. https://t.co/SBi53pofA2

Are there still artsy neighborhoods in the cities? Oh yes! Discover #Bacalan, in #Bordeaux, in our new #VoloteaTravelBlog 👉
https://t.co/VKzApJAC9M https://t.co/KTrAOlXuEY
RT @recordplayUK: No sponsored content nor tourist traps, just the genuine taste of a local musician in his or her hometown. This year @vol…

Traveling to the same city in a different season is like traveling to another city. The colors change, the temperature changes and even the plans change. Today we welcome autumn and so, here's a question for you: What city would you go to now?
#Volotea #autumn #Vienna https://t.co/2SDjP9Ps6j

En Corse, tous les couchers de soleil sont aussi jolis 😍 : Merci
@jesusbotaro pour la photo #Ajaccio #Corse #France #Volotea https://t.co/j4DIBcjM3T

data.text:
If we tell you that ...
- it's bathed by the Atlantic Sea 🌊
- you will find there the best octopus 🐙
- they call it Cristal city 💎
- its emblem is the Tower of Hercules
What city are we talking about? Discover it with #Volotea! https://t.co/HXpzAem2GT

entity.name: Dinner
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations that mention dinner.

data.text:
Cagliari is famous for its beaches and the fish of its gastronomy. And what's better than a good dinner after a long day by the sea? Recommend us a dish or a restaurant and tell us who you would go with ;)
Thanks for the photo📸 @marinatures
#Volotea #Italy #Cagliari #restaurant https://t.co/iBvHGCd8l4

Just one month left for the big day of #FiestasDelPilar. If you still don't have the flowers for the offering or your regional costume, we forgive you; but, hey, not having your flight yet... #Volotea #Zaragoza @fiestaspilaroficial https://t.co/MeIIf9gx4d

In class they will learn a lot. And traveling, too.
Book the flights now for the next family trip, and get your kids' flights for free: https://t.co/UUxIvWYYrW https://t.co/T5HNcAXZJF

data.text:
#Voloteainfo September 6th: Due to a airport staff strike called in Italy, our regular flight activity may be affected.  
👉More information: https://t.co/kJswXKw6y7
✈️Check your flight status: https://t.co/dSCtPNZ4k9 https://t.co/0SN5GDJNSF

We will support  DΔNTE AERONAUTICAL to develop a state-of-art hybrid-electric aircraft. It is a project involving renowned institutions in Europe and Australia and aims to reduce 50% fuel emissions. Read more here: 
 https://t.co/C8IqjElhXb https://t.co/YlMgzDuLs9

We have good news and bad news:
- The bad one: there are only 20 days left until summer ends 😥
- The good one: you can fly from 9 € and take advantage of the last rays of sun ☀️ ✈️
https://t.co/oLdYl7D4lU https://t.co/m1l6BtGFTV

Sardinia is much more than beaches. It is also Bosa, San Pantaleo, Santu Lussurgiu or Castelsardo. Which of these villages would you stick with?
#Sardegna #Bosa #SanPantaleo #Castelsardo #Volotea https://t.co/OwlKX721rk

Our top 5 beaches to get lost in A Coruña is one of the best things of the summer: 
https://t.co/yYmR58qV74
#VoloteaTravelBlog #beach # Coruña #Galice #Volotea https://t.co/mhwCOWhGzH

Today we put you to the test: could you tell us how many bridges are there in #Prague?
One clue: there are more than 300 🌉
#bridges #curiosities #Volotea https://t.co/2Z1EWBBN6r

We have made our top 10 of #Cork. It has been a tough decision, but we have got them 💪. Our favorite place is #7 ! What about yours? :)
https://t.co/ItIvU5eueP
#EnglishMarket #UnivesityCollegeCork #ShandonBells #VoloteaTravelBlog #Volotea https://t.co/4Ao9h9Rj0C

Are you one of those who enters a museum and then is unable to leave? Well, in these four #Zaragoza museums you will definitely get lost:
https://t.co/ONr2C3pwAi
📷 @museogoya
#museums #art #VoloteaTravelBlog #Volotea https://t.co/evcjs7KjBy

Would you guess what #Volotea city is this one?
a) La Valetta, Malta
b) Heraklion, Creta https://t.co/mQCxwwRNjr

data.text:
🤔We were thinking ... what can you buy today for € 1? And yes, there are still some things, but none of them take you as far as our flights to more than 80 destinations if you are #Megavolotea ✈️ 
https://t.co/krk1G70QPn
#promotion #flights #travel #Volotea https://t.co/M2JotmejgB

Music festivals with big names, solidarity and, some of them, focused to travelers. Discover how to be all in A Coruña this summer at #VoloteaTravelBlog 🤘
https://t.co/OCRZXQZC66
Thanks https://t.co/6LraMlu2ET for the photo 📷 https://t.co/KzSZEDftlL

We have already arrived! The mission trip #TheFirstRealTripToMars has been a success ... although Mars is not exactly where we imagined it would be 🤔:
https://t.co/3GMSOQ2klY https://t.co/baLfgYDxYM

What will the passengers of #TheFirstRealTripToMars eat? We don't know what they will find there, but meanwhile, for the flight, we have prepared some typical dishes of the European cuisine (in Space's format, of course). https://t.co/BUToIMAOmd
Our influencers are already prepared for the mission. And you? Only 5 days left! 🕜 #TheFirstRealTripToMars https://t.co/CaNLiL6W5D
Who would you send to #TheFirstRealTripToMars with a one-way ticket (no return)?

25 million passengers have already flown with us
🙌! And there's no better way to celebrate it than with flights from € 9. Where would you go?
https://t.co/slTyUM3ZiA
#VoloteaDays https://t.co/2kFqeRdF9B

#Voloteainfo: Friday, July 26th, due to Air industry strike called in Italy, some of our flights will be affected.
👉more information: https://t.co/7MSexUBTMA
✈ check your flight status: https://t.co/dSCtPNHsVz https://t.co/doAJfic5CE

We have already made all the changes that the plane required for the
🚀 #TheFirstRealTripToMars. Now all we need is the most important thing: sockets for charging your mobile phone of course! https://t.co/1EPTOObXZT
Hey @Thom_astro, qu'est-ce que vous pensez du fait que ce sont des influenceurs et non des astronautes qui embarquent pour notre mission #TheFirstRealTripToMars ?

@elonmusk ! We are on the verge of undertaking our #TheFirstRealTripToMars mission and we thought you might be interested in hearing about it. Shall we book you a seat?

entity.name: 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 launch  🚀
entity.description: On July 16, 1969, the Apollo 11 space mission launched from the Kennedy Space Center on its journey to the moon with three astronauts on board. This took place four days before the landing happened.

domain.name: Events [Entity Service]
domain.description: Real world events.

entity.name: It's been 50 years since the Apollo 11 moon landing
entity.description: On July 20, 1969, astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin became the first humans to set foot on the moon's surface. They travelled to the moon on Apollo 11, along with Michael Collins who orbited around the moon from the command module. Photo via @NASAAmes

data.text: Hello @TheRealBuzz, as one of the crew for #Apollo11 we want to ask your advice on behalf of the crew for #TheFirstRealTripToMars. What should they pack in their suitcase?
Hello @MarsOneProject! You might be interested in our new project #TheFirstRealTripToMars which will be launching in a few days. Let us know in case you need to change your name to Mars Two...

50 years after stepping on the moon, we make history again (if we arrive at the airport on time).
#TheFirstRealTripToMars https://t.co/9DB4EsBOJv

#TheFirstRealTripToMars #25MillionVolotea #NotFakeNews

Thank you @gorety_santos for this amazing photo!
#Volotea #Spain #Zaragoza #Fresh https://t.co/GibvNLq4G2

https://t.co/M57cMEl0tz https://t.co/qH4AA9nLUF

#Volotea #Greece #Athens #Shopping #jewels #piel #filigree https://t.co/g65V99eJIY

data.text:
How to refresh yourself in #Ajaccio is going to be the only big decision that you are going to take this summer:
RT for having an ice cream in its colorful center 🍦
FAV for taking a bath in one of its wonderful coves 🏖️
Fly to #Ajaccio with #Volotea https://t.co/ZTuMw1O40c

We have discovered one of the best kept secrets of the Venetians: where to have a real aperitif with the best views of Venice. Cin, cin!
More info in our #VoloteaTravelBlog : https://t.co/Z4yZfiH76F
#Volotea #Venice #Aperitif #SecretSpot https://t.co/ukGHYkI0nL
These are the ideal beaches for the summer: the most voted by our followers. Did you know them? https://t.co/Za6nKb2iOB

https://t.co/slTyUM3ZiA
#Volotea #promo https://t.co/vUcfcgC9uc

📣Attention festival lovers📣 Toulouse in summer is full of parties and it offers a program suitable for all audiences and tastes. Tell us what you want and we help you find your perfect festival.
#Volotea #Toulouse #Festivals #Plans https://t.co/lwLz7UgBKK

#Volotea #Santander #PicosDeEuropa #Beach https://t.co/Hc8U27yJmS

Spain has many coasts but ... have you heard of the 'Costa Cálida'? It is located in Murcia and there you can enjoy water sports and landscapes. You have an appointment with Murcia in our #VoloteaTravelBlog:
 https://t.co/2LkNofeove https://t.co/0pK5JPoMvO

Traveling with your family? Yes, and your children's flights are free for you. You just need to worry about taking the suncreen and the smiles in the suitcase 😉 Choose your next destination here: https://t.co/UUxIvWYYrW 
☀ https://t.co/s6S1cCS3qr

data.text:
Ready for a little vacay? ☀✈ With MegaVolotea you can travel ✈ to many destinations for only 1€ 😲
Discover all the #Volotea destinations with discount on the website 👉 
https://t.co/krk1G70QPn https://t.co/gJkL9ZjDvr

The connection between Venice and the sea is so strong that it influences even its cuisine.
Do you know why cod has become a fundamental ingredient of its dishes? Discover Venice's story in our #VoloteaTravelBlog: 
https://t.co/XH2773iOxR https://t.co/XIQqVkNmB7

Cagliari is the ideal base for tuna lovers because, just 2 hours from the city, on the island of Carloforte, it is said that that you can find the best tuna in the world. You definitely need to try it! Fly to #Cagliari with #Volotea https://t.co/awAKvLMvkb

data.text: 6 restaurants with Michelin Star, 10 Bib Gourmand, 12 Repsol Suns and dozens of restaurants where you can enjoy one of the best gastronomies. Fly to #Santander and discover the paradise that is @cantabriaturismo. https://t.co/MGBQGXfV0Y

In case we were looking for excuses to visit Bordeaux, it turns out that the city renews its museums! Find all the info in our #VoloteaTravelBlog 👉 
https://t.co/aRvRo2bqfr https://t.co/rUMoRJKNYr

data.text:
Get an unforgettable memory by the coast of Asturias. Discover its fishermen's villas with their old quarters, its ports, its beaches and cliffs and their sea views. There are surprises that the Asturian coastline holds for you at our #VoloteaTravelBlog: 
https://t.co/vKvXNKsSz8 https://t.co/lbZF9nvH93

Today you can plan your next trip from 1€! 😮

data.text: Malta is home to some fascinating historical monuments and, also, it's one of the most enlightened destinations in Europe. An idyllic vacation awaits you, starting with the flight: with #Volotea of ​​course! #DiscoverMalta https://t.co/pxllXAx2Ls

Last call to participate in #ShowUsYourType of Genoa. You have 5 days to upload your city poster here 👉 https://t.co/9HIUbQjQHI
And also if you're from Genoa or you live there, you can get € 300 to fly with Volotea. https://t.co/lfYHGYFGqa

Traveling and family can actually match 👉
Fly with your kids with Volotea! Now we have free flights for children under 12 👧.
What are you waiting for? https://t.co/5TXglyUdf5 https://t.co/Yyw9vRrruf

Bastia stands out for that charm that the port towns have. Wander through its market, enjoy its coves, relax in the fresh garden of Romieu... A delicious stay awaits you in #Bastia with #Volotea. https://t.co/ULoIN04vbO

data.text: Did you know that surfing is the perfect sport to practice all year round? 220km of coastline, more than 60 surf spots👉 Cantabria is a paradise for surfers of any level. For more info visit our blog:  https://t.co/MGEdIV1C9N https://t.co/pM2riwexGd

entity.name: Game of Thrones
entity.description:
The final season is here.

Photo via @GameofThrones

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Game of Thrones
entity.description: George R.R. Martin's best-selling book series `A Song of Ice and Fire' is brought to the screen as HBO sinks its considerable storytelling teeth into the medieval fantasy epic. It's the depiction of two powerful families - kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars and honest men - playing a deadly game for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, and to sit atop the Iron Throne. Martin is credited as a co-executive producer and one of the writers for the series, which was filmed in Northern Ireland and Malta.

data.text:
What does Genoa inspire to you? Along with @showusyourtype we are looking for the best typographic poster for Genoa. Could it be yours? Participate and, if you are from Genoa, you can win € 300 to fly with Volotea. Upload it here: https://t.co/0E0nJNLCGK
https://t.co/wmpSUQJiZ0 https://t.co/OVzLL0jwuz

We introduce you the trio of Asturian aces ♠ ️:
- Avilés, its port and the Ocean.
- Gijón, its cider and its beaches.
- Oviedo, its historic center and its museums.
Do you want to know more? Find out here:  https://t.co/ogJbrKTOmS
#Volotea #Asturias https://t.co/CqXEVKpJTB
